Articles.Content: Just a quick question about ships here, If I have say a carrier, Am I allowed to have weapons mounted to my carrier, and secondly if not, Can my carrier deploy a small weapons platform I made, sort of jump in unload fighters deploy Mobile missile platform, get out, And if so would said missile platform count as a satellite weapon? or Other?, It's about the size of a small satellite btw.

Just a quick question about ships here, If I have say a carrier, Am I allowed to have weapons mounted to my carrier, and secondly if not, Can my carrier deploy a small weapons platform I made, sort of jump in unload fighters deploy Mobile missile platform, get out, And if so would said missile platform count as a satellite weapon? or Other?, It's about the size of a small satellite btw.

You can mount weapons on a carrier, but the weapons cannot be fired by the carrier. AKA weapon storage for the fighters. Also yes you can deploy and leave, but everything you deploy must be fighters, but the fighters can be drones. Other is mainly a category for fuel/weapon carriers, tug drones, and etc.

Satellite weapons can only be mounted over your planet as a defence.

I hope that answers your question! Let me know if you need any clarification or have other questions.
